data.name: Override 2 Ultraman - Dan Moroboshi - Fighter DLC
data.detailed_description: Play as Dan Moroboshi, equipped with the sleek and powerful Ultraman Suit 7. Dan Moroboshi wields a mighty katana that can send shockwaves. Featured in the Netflix ULTRAMAN series, Dan Moroboshi joins the cast of mech arena fighters, ready to slash everyone that gets in his way.
data.about_the_game: Play as Dan Moroboshi, equipped with the sleek and powerful Ultraman Suit 7. Dan Moroboshi wields a mighty katana that can send shockwaves. Featured in the Netflix ULTRAMAN series, Dan Moroboshi joins the cast of mech arena fighters, ready to slash everyone that gets in his way.
data.short_description: Purchasing this DLC unlocks Dan Moroboshi as a playable character in Override 2: Super Mech League
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-760 2.8 GHz / AMD Athlon X4 740 3.2 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2 GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
